meanings.definition: The action or manner of functioning.
meanings.sent1: The functioning of the machine was smooth and efficient.
meanings.sent2: I observed the functioning of the clock to understand how it worked.
meanings.sent3: The functioning of the clown's act brought laughter to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The functioning of a team is like a well-oiled machine, each part working in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The functioning of a car engine is crucial for the vehicle to move forward.

meanings.definition: The normal operation or behavior of something.
meanings.sent1: The functioning of the computer was flawless.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the functioning of the ecosystem is important for conservation efforts.
meanings.sent3: The functioning of the party was disrupted by the unexpected arrival of a celebrity.
meanings.sent4: The functioning of a family can be compared to a delicate dance, each member playing a vital role.
meanings.sent5: The functioning of a watch relies on its intricate mechanisms to keep time accurately.

meanings.definition: To work or operate in a proper or expected way.
meanings.sent1: The new machine is functioning well after the repairs.
meanings.sent2: I hope my phone starts functioning properly after the software update.
meanings.sent3: The robot malfunctioned, but after fixing it, it started functioning again.
meanings.sent4: Her brain was functioning at full capacity during the exam.
meanings.sent5: The heart must keep functioning to pump blood throughout the body.
